title: Israel Central Bank Balance Sheet
description: Central Bank Balance Sheet in Israel decreased to 785190 ILS Million in August from 800156 ILS Million in July of 2022. Central Bank Balance Sheet in Israel averaged 296380.92 ILS Million from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 813499 ILS Million in June of 2022 and a record low of 102859 ILS Million in February of 2000. This page provides the latest reported value for - Israel Central Bank Balance Sheet - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Bank of Israel
